analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xd5a1f6e32c008395a34ff2a3e2272ab8df569b67.sol:
	Contract NOBLECASH has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xd5a1f6e32c008395a34ff2a3e2272ab8df569b67.sol#191-193)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0xd5a1f6e32c008395a34ff2a3e2272ab8df569b67.sol:
